name: Len R's Old Rounded Dialogs/Textboxes FF3
description:
See re-make at http://userstyles.org/styles/6601

Please support me if you enjoy this; thank you to everyone who has already! I also appreciate reviews if you enjoy this theme.

Designed for Vista at 120dpi; no guarantees on 72dpi systems. I've made a few changes to try to help, but there are a few glitches I can't seem to iron out, due to how FFX is setup.
